description: Submission of details pursuant to Conditions 1.27 (Details of On and/or Off Site Drainage), 44.5 (Surface Water Drainage) and 45.4 (Flood Storage Design)of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/14 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood. Such details submitted to fully discharge the condition requirements in relating to Phase 2 (South) (Plots) development including: High Street South; Claremont Park Road (Part 2) (20/5534/RMA) and the tertiary street associated with Plot 14 (20/5690/RMA). Partial discharge is also sought pertaining to Phase 2 (South) (Plots) development including Plot 14 (Excluding the tertiary street) (20/5690/RMA) and Plot 15 (21/0070/RMA) and the Phase 2 (South) (Station Approach) Interim Transport  Interchange (21/2289/RMA).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
